rules.ruleString: Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {ESC2122, ESC2192}
Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {ESC2111, ESC2122}

description: Advanced concepts of groundwater flow. Sustainable use of groundwater and mineral resources. Chemistry of groundwater and water rock interaction. Groundwater-surface water interactions. Weathering processes in relation to nutrient and contaminant cycling. CO2 sequestration. Mine site processes.
